resources.string: Do you want to learn about c:geo?\nCheck our easy to read manual.

c:geo failed to connect to internal database.\nPlease try to start c:geo a bit later. If this message has been showed for many times, proceed to phone Settings / Applications / c:geo and hit the Clear Data button. Or uninstall and install c:geo again. Sorry for inconvenience.
Failed connection to geocaching.com (server or connection down?)
User has not agreed to Geocaching.com license agreement, so c:geo can\'t load caches coordinates.
Sorry, c:geo can\'t open geocache details.
Sorry, c:geo can\'t display geocache you want. Is it really geocache?
Sorry, c:geo can\'t find that geocache.
Sorry, c:geo can\'t find any geocache.
Sorry, c:geo can\'t find next geocaches.
Sorry, c:geo forgot which geocache you want.
Sorry, c:geo forgot which cache you visited.
c:geo can\'t read some cache details. Please check if the geocaching.com website is set to English. Unfortunately, c:geo doesn\'t understand other localisations.
c:geo found no spoiler images for this cache.
c:geo found no static maps for this cache.
Sorry, c:geo failed to load static maps.
This function requires Radar application. Should it be installed?
c:geo can\'t start Android Market to search for Radar application.
Sorry, c:geo can\'t start Radar application. Is it installed?
c:geo can\'t find any supported navigation.
c:geo can\'t find any suitable application.
Sorry, c:geo failed to initialize authorization process.
c:geo has not enough information to log visit. Please, do it from full cache details.
Sorry, c:geo can\'t clear login information.
Sorry, c:geo failed to load cache or caches.
Sorry, c:geo failed to download caches because of
Sorry, c:geo failed to load cache list.
Sorry, c:geo failed to download cache details.
Sorry, c:geo failed to download cache details because of
c:geo doesn\'t know location of cache.
Manual for c:geo is not present in your device. Should it be installed?
c:geo can\'t start Android Market to search for Manual of c:geo.
Please enter a device name before registering.
"Sorry, c:geo can\'t display trackable you want. Is it really trackable?
Sorry, c:geo can\'t open trackable details.
Sorry, c:geo failed to download trackable details because of
Sorry, c:geo forgot which trackable you want.
Sorry, c:geo forgot which trackable you saw.
Sorry, c:geo can\'t find that trackable.
Sorry, c:geo doesn\'t know to which cache you want to add waypoint.
Sorry, c:geo forgot what waypoint you want to display.
Sorry, c:geo failed to add your waypoint.
Sorry, c:geo failed to load waypoint.
Sorry, c:geo can\'t recognize where you are.
Fill at least latitude or longitude or distance and bearing. You can also fill all four fields.
c:geo still doesn\'t have current coordinates. Please, wait a while...
Fill both bearing and distance. Bearing is angle 0 to 360 degrees relative to north. Distance with or without units.
Sorry, c:geo can\'t get location of waypoint.
c:geo can\'t find any supported navigation.
Sorry, c:geo can\'t load data required to log visit.
Sorry, c:geo can\'t load data required to log visit. Trying again.
c:geo is still loading data required to post log. Please wait a little while longer.
Sorry, c:geo failed to post log because server is not responding.
It seems that your log was not posted. Please check it on geocaching.com.
Sorry, c:geo failed to post log because of
Sorry, c:geo found no matching place.
Sorry, c:geo forgot address you try to find.
There is nothing to be saved.
There is no cache with coordinates.
"Fill address or location name. For example use street address \"Radlicka 100, Prague, Czech Republic\", city name \"Berlin\" or just name of something like \"Yellowstone Park\".
Fill code of geocache. For example \"GC1VCAZ\".
Fill some word that is supposed to be somewhere in cache name you are trying to find.
Fill name of user at Geocaching.com.
Fill code of trackable. For example \"TB29QMZ\".
Type of log has been changed!
Do you want to remove selected caches from device?
Do you want to remove all caches from current list?
Please, write text from image. It\'s important to download coordinates of caches. It\'s optional and can be switched off in Settings.
c:geo failed to create new list
Do you want to remove current list of caches? All caches remaining in the list will be moved to \"Stored\".
c:geo failed to remove current list
Write your signature to use in log text.\nSpecial strings that can be used are: [DATE] , [TIME], [USER] & [NUMBER].\nThese will be expanded when the signature is inserted.
Which languages you don\'t need to translate? Please provide two-character language codes.
Store static maps for offline use
Show direction to caches in its list
If GPS is giving wrong altitude to you, you can correct with a positive or negative number. Correction is always in metres.
Please note this option will backup/restore the database containing caches and waypoints, not settings. Your login information (passwords) will not leave this application.
Database of c:geo was successfully copied to the file
Backup of database of c:geo failed.
There is no file with backup.

Here you can select the source for your maps. As an alternative to Google maps various OpenStreetMap styles are available and even off line map files (see http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/ for details).
Send to c:geo allows you to recieve caches directly from geocaching site using special plugin for Firefox or Chrome. Before registration please read http://send2cgeo.carnero.cc/.
Registering your device for "Send to c:geo"...
Registration succesful. PIN code is ####. Use it on c:geo website to add this device to your browser.
Please type in PIN code provided by Twitter website. It\'s mandatory to complete authorization.
c:geo is now authorized to post on Twitter.
This cache is on your watchlist.
This cache is not on your watchlist.
Sorry, c:geo found no appropriate files.
There was a problem while communicating with server. Please re-register your phone and try again.
Waiting for new caches from web...
Failed to add event cache to calendar
Since c:geo is able to download only partial data, coordinates of caches could be inaccurate.
In the hands of the owner
Comprehensive manual for c:geo that contains description of all possibilities of this application (even hidden ones).
Simple usable application showing Online maps and allowing to download them directly into Offline mode (raster maps only). Also support track recording, POI handling and many other useful functions.
You can use radar from this application with c:geo. It also offers a lot of other GPS-related information.
Allows you to use external GPS device to get better reception, more precise location and can spare battery of your phone.
Access or parking fee not required
To use services of geocaching.com, terms and conditions of Groundspeak disclaimer have to be agreed.
To make geocaching easier, to make users lazier.

The service Go 4 Cache shows other geocachers on the map (in c:geo or in browser) in real time. It can show, for example, what cache they\'re searching for. By connecting to Go 4 Cache c:geo is allowed to publish current location when geocaching (only while c:geo is running).
Should c:geo publish new status on Twitter everytime a cache is logged?
The following process allows c:geo to access Twitter - if agreed.

Click on \"authorize c:geo\" button will start the process. This process will open up a web browser with Twitter page. Login on this page and allow c:geo to access your account. If accepted, Twitter will show up a numeric PIN code. This PIN must be pasted into c:geo and be confirmed. That\'s all.

2.26 (once in 2011)
 new: Autoinsert of signature
 new: Send to c:geo from web
 new: Export field notes
 new: Clear history
 fix: Live map, better loading
 fix: Overwriting coords with wrong ones
 fix: Loading caches on Live map
 fix: GCVote issues
 fix: ForceClose on maps (home, help)
 fix: Android 1.5, 1.6
 
 2.25 (11.06.2011)
 fix: Performance & usability
 fix: Maps in Japan
 
 2.24 (31.05.2011)
 fix: Performance optimizations
 fix: Other users on map
 fix: Displaying single cache on map
 fix: LOT of different things
 new: Distance circles for caches
 
 2.22 (18.05.2011)
 fix: Few minor problems
 
 2.21.x (10.05.2011)
 fix: Names in list
 fix: Found caches
 fix: Switching to English
 fix: Live map
 fix: Logging of trackables
 
 2.20 (06.05.2011)
 Fixed many issues from prev. version
 Finished adaptation
 
 2.13.x (05.05.2011)
 change: Optimized map
 change: Search for GPX files in /gpx
 fix: Adaptation on GC.com changes
 fix: Posting logs with a lot of TBs
 fix: Logtypes for cache owner
 fix: Displaying spoiler images
 missing: Other users on map
 missing: Action for all TBs when logging
 
 2.13 (14.04.2011)
 fix: Own waypoints on map
 
 2.12, 2.11 (13.04.2011)
 fix: Sorting caches with disabled GPS
 fix: Compatibility issues for <2.1
 
 2.10 (13.04.2011)
 fix: Moving caches during refresh
 fix: Opening Radar
 remove: Closest cache bubble on Live map
 new: Remembering last used list
 new: Number of logs in detail
 new: Sorting caches in list
 
 2.09 (24.03.2011)
 new: Caches lists
 fix: Disabling of Twitter
 fix: Unified navigation options
 fix: Line breaks in logs
 
 2.08 (17.03.2011)
 fix: Faster displaying caches on the map
 change: Visual style of loading of caches
 return: Static maps
 
 2.07 (16.03.2011)
 new: Approx. elevation in details
 new: Terrain preview
 new: Own waypoints on map
 new: Translation of description & hint
 new: Database backup/restore
 remove: Static maps
 
 2.06 (10.03.2011)
 fix: Size of caches in lists
 fix: Marking own caches
 new: Translation PL
 
 2.05 (09.03.2011)
 fix: Marking caches as found
 fix: Own caches
 fix: Some optimizations
 fix: Event caches
 new: Trackable icon
 new: Search using HW key
 new: List of supported apps
 
 2.04 (20.02.2011)
 new: Logs for trackables
 new: Access to map from "any dest."
 new: Ability to force English
 fix: Favorites count
 update: Translation
 
 2.03 (13.02.2011)
 fix: Loading images in cache description
 fix: GC/TB code input
 update: Translation (SV, PT)
 
 2.02 (02.02.2011)
 new: History of logged caches (online&offline)
 fix: Number of found caches in signature
 fix: Exact position of caches on Live Map
 fix: Adaptation for GC.com changes
 
 2.01 (23.01.2011)
 fix: Fixed crashing due to loading large images
 
 2.00 (23.01.2011)
 new: Context menu for geocachers (in cache detail)
 new: Option to add date, time and signature at once
 new: Better trackable support
 new: Signature template
 new: Any destination saves last used location
 fix: End of line in logs
